column4: I'm moving myself over to using ubuntu on my main machine all the time and one think I have not figure out what to do about is that I do depend on GoToMeeting of WebEx when giving sales presentations and the like to multiple potential clients, things like GoToMeeting of WebEx are great. Is there anything for group screen sharing that DOES work under ubuntu?
webex works well for ubuntu then?
I haven't tried it personally yet, lemme try right now
